bug.author: yaroslavvb
bug.summary: Stale run names on overview page
bug.description:
If you go to <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/cybertronai>https://app.wandb.ai/cybertronai</denchmark-link> you'll see run names like . <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23068/60485272-3f4ff700-9c51-11e9-88a0-f2ea07fcd983.png></denchmark-link>
Click on the run, then go back, it becomes <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23068/60485267-3bbc7000-9c51-11e9-85e5-e675b740665b.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.95. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yaroslavvb>@yaroslavvb</denchmark-link>
